hero.title: QZPay Playground
hero.subtitle: Explore, test, and understand the QZPay billing library in a safe sandbox environment. No backend setup, no real payments, just pure learning.
hero.tourDescription: Take a guided tour to learn how to use all the playground features

whatIsQzpay.title: What is QZPay?
whatIsQzpay.description: QZPay is a universal billing and payments library that provides a consistent API for handling subscriptions, payments, invoices, and more across multiple payment providers like Stripe and MercadoPago.

providerAgnostic.title: Provider Agnostic
providerAgnostic.description: Write once, deploy anywhere. Switch between Stripe and MercadoPago without code changes.

typeSafe.title: Type Safe
typeSafe.description: Full TypeScript support with comprehensive types for all billing operations.

eventDriven.title: Event Driven
eventDriven.description: React to billing events in real-time with a powerful event system.

mockMode.title: Mock Mode
mockMode.description: All operations are simulated locally. No API keys needed, no real charges, perfect for learning and testing your billing flows.

localStorage.title: LocalStorage Persistence
localStorage.description: Your data is saved in your browser. Come back anytime to continue where you left off, or reset to start fresh.

realTimeEvents.title: Real-time Events
realTimeEvents.description: Watch billing events as they happen. Click any event to inspect its payload and understand how QZPay works.

exportReady.title: Export Ready
exportReady.description: When you're happy with your billing setup, export it as code ready to use in your production application.

step1.label: SETUP
step1.title: 1. Initialize the Playground
step1.description: Choose Mock mode (recommended) or connect real test API keys from Stripe or MercadoPago.

step2.label: CATALOG
step2.title: 2. Define Your Billing Catalog
step2.description: Create the building blocks of your billing system:

items.plans: Plans - Your subscription tiers (Basic, Pro, Enterprise)
items.prices: Prices - Pricing for each plan (monthly, yearly)
items.addons: Add-ons - Optional extras customers can purchase
items.promos: Promo Codes - Discounts and special offers

items.createCustomers: Create customers and subscribe them to plans
items.manageSubscriptions: Upgrade, downgrade, pause, or cancel subscriptions
items.viewInvoices: View generated invoices and payment history

step4.label: VIEW
step4.title: 4. Inspect Events & State
step4.description: Watch events flow in real-time at the bottom of the screen. Click any event to see its full payload. Use the State view to inspect all stored data.

cta.title: Ready to Explore?
cta.description: Start by initializing the playground in Mock mode. You can always reset and start over.
